description:
Luka is a spunky 22-year-old stud from the west coast. He likes to lift weights and run and he is taking stunt classes to learn to do flips and tricks for the girls. You can tell he's used that technique on the ladies a few times, as he plants his feet and gives a point and thumbs up to the camera just like he would to some chick on the beach!

He confesses to taking off his shirt at the gym on occasion, although it's not allowed at the gym where he works out. He says seeing his muscles work in the mirror is good motivation.
title: Luka
